Tucson nodds with approval and looks upward. Again, after having found Rodi=
mus, his vision begins to fail him, until everything just seems to black ou=
t all at once.

"Yes Legacy, please, take him back to saftey.  Unfortunatel=
y, now that Rodimus has been found, I've lost my vision and this time, the =
only way it can be corrected is by hand.  Inform Lord Elder that all is wel=
l with us, and hopefully we'll be able to return soon also."

Straight Shot=
 looks up to the entrance.  She then looks to Legacy.

"Wait a sec, I have =
an idea.  Legacy, what if we shot a cable up your way and you could secure =
it to something solid?  I bet we could start getting some bots out of here =
safely by just creating some sort of winch like lever."

Quick Stride scrat=
ches behind one ear.

" Hmmm, that's one heck of a climb, and we dunno if t=
here is anything solid that we can attatch it to.  But I suppose we don't k=
now until someone gets out of this hole, right?"

Tucson turns his head tow=
ard Quickstride.

"Affirmative.  We'll just have to go by our exploration a=
nd hope for the best."
